instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: MacBook Pro Touchbar /Mid-2017
threads.message: screen was replaced at another shop, i haven't gotten the computer yet. but apparently after the repair the touch-bar stopped working, as i haven't had any experience with touch-bars yet i was looking for some guidance, what should i look for, what could cause it. im assuming something got broken off somewhere. but is there anything else that could cause this from replacing a screen assembly?

threads.title: MacBook Pro Touchbar /Mid-2017
threads.message:
Probably knocked off component, or broken trace.
Check some voltages and signals on touchbar connector.
